topics.body:
God damn I'm pissed.

If you're wondering where I've been I've been chilling out this July 4th and playing a game I bought like a year ago, but didn't have a computer powerful enough to play it; Sanctum.


I kind of liked the game up until they introduced this enemy that you have to pull off three consecutive head shots with a sniper rifle cause nothing else damages them.  It wouldn't be so bad if the monster didn't have his head bobbing around like a paddle ball beating the crap out of the ball.  What's worse is that they throw twenty at you.  That means you have to 600 headshots in the course of five minutes.

On the plus side I've gotten so good at headshots in games thanks to this bullcrap that I could probably shoot a apple off on top of Michael J Fox's head after you give him a triple espresso without hitting him.





Political new:
Republicans and libertarians may want to close their ears cause it's going to make them run out the door screaming:
So apparently republicans future presidential electability is so shot to hell that even mainstream 24/7 news is now reporting on how low their chances are maintaining coherent as a party and not being forced to dissolve.  What I mean by this is essentially: Damn the republican party's chances of maintaining electability post 2016 are so low at this point that even the news is starting to question if they're going to be able to be electable in the future and starting to question where conservatives should go from here.

To make it short: If you're republican or libertarian 2015 is going to be a extremely painful year for you politically and 2016 is going to be year of the "OH FUCK! We dun fucked up!".
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b7e22a6368723334e00300#post_53b7e22a6368723334e00300
I'm not savvy with American politics (only Scottish and English) but didn't the republicans have binders full of women?
topics.author: 515ddf93a4c72d8a1f000d57

topics.body:
"@ThatRandomGuy42":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b7e7996368723472dd0500#post_53b7e7996368723472dd0500
That was a dumb sentence Romney said without thinking before he said it.



To make it extremely short for non-americans or people that don't keep up with politics the usa doesn't have a direct vote; we have "electoral votes" where each state has a set amount of votes that represent the population.  Bigger states get bigger number of votes.  In order to become president you have to win 270 electoral votes; popular vote doesn't matter.  Hell Bush didn't even win the popular vote the second time so technically speaking we didn't vote for Bush to get his second term.

Anyways republicans, the party that's against birth control, gay rights, immigration and so forth dun fucked up bad.  Simply put they can no longer get elected president even in optimal scenarios.

The democrats on the other hand will automatically have 246 electoral votes in the bag; the best republicans can hope for is only 200 electoral votes.


Tl:dr; The conservative party, aka the republican party, aka Bush's party in the usa dun fucked up and nuked themselves.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b7e97663687234276e0600#post_53b7e97663687234276e0600
That's a good thing, right?
I don't really have solid opinions on birth control or immigration, but if they are against gay rights, I hope they never get in.
topics.author: 515ddf93a4c72d8a1f000d57

topics.body:
"@ThatRandomGuy42":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b7e9f46368725257b80000#post_53b7e9f46368725257b80000
Probably what's going to happen is a new "Era of good feeling".  The era of good feeling was a period in the usa in which the whig party(a now dead political party) died and for about a decade the party in power was uncontested.

Basically you know how you guys in europe make fun of us for being so bassackwards and not having things like universal healthcare or such?  Well we very well could swing hard towards such beliefs cause the party who opposes universal healthcare, gay rights, immigration, lesser prison sentences, gun control, increase in spending on stuff like education and so forth is about to collapse hard in two years cause they dun fucked up.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
I have given up on the Internet. 
Due to my most important examination in a month's time, I have to devote every second of my time studying for it. 
That means no games, no TV, no phone and most importantly, no Internet. 

This isn't the first time I did this. 
In fact, 2 years ago I did the same thing. For me to focus, I acted like a complete antisocial prick for an entire year. I studied and studied and studied without a care in the world. I got straight As that year but I also had no idea what happened throughout the year. Now, I'm gonna do it again if it means to be successful. 

This will probably be my last post for the entire year. Goodbye, Derpibooru and I'll miss you guys.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b7ece563687220d94f0000#post_53b7ece563687220d94f0000
Excellent. Universal healthcare will save countless lives in America because they won't need to pay for it. Gun control should hopefully lessen the rate of gun-related crimes like muggings and murder (or increase it because hurr durr forbidden fruits and such)
Who knows, sounds like the start of a golden age for America.
...ok that's a bit far. Silver Age?
